main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Fort Monmouth, N.J. on August 7, 1952, appearing to change direction and having a tail.
interesting points: The object was observed from the ground and by radar, The sighting lasted between 1-5 minutes, The object had a flashing light and appeared to disintegrate, Witnesses reported that it appeared larger than conventional aircraft, The sighting occurred before sunrise.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a tail
witness description: The report was filled out by a supervisor with a background in radar.
